title: Daggers
content: Rhapsody 1d4 +1 Piercing Weapon Enchantment +1 Scarlet Remittance: Gain a +1 bonus to Attack Rolls, damage, and Spell Save DC for every foe you slay, up to a maximum of +3 Sweet Bloodletting: Possibly inflict Bleeding when hitting a creature with this weapon while Hiding or Invisible Piercing Strike Stillmaker 1d4 +2 Piercing Weapon Enchantment +2 Hold Person (Lvl 3) Pommel StrikeLaceratePiercing Strike Blade of the First Blood 1d4 +2 Piercing Weapon Enchantment +2 Improved Critical: The number
